titles.title: A bill to make amendments to the Congressional charter for Group Hospitalization and Medical Services.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8618-8619)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/13/1993--Introduced. Amends the Act providing for the incorporation of Group Hospitalization, Inc., to provide that: (1) the District of Columbia shall be the legal domicile of the corporation; and (2) the corporation shall be licensed and regulated by the District and shall reimburse the District for the costs of insurance regulation of the corporation (and its affiliates and subsidiaries) by the District.
